body.name: The Honey Pot Company Mommy to Be | Herbal Infused Feminine Hygiene Natural Wash for Pregnancy/Maternity Care | PH Balanced Plant Based Wash Free from Parabens and Sulfates | 5.51 Fluid Oz.

byLineInfo.name: Visit the The Honey Pot Company Store

deliveryMessages: FREE delivery February 21 - 23 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: The Honey Pot herbal feminine wash is made by women, for women, because it takes one to know one. Developed using 100% all-natural ingredients, this maternity intimate care cleanser is safe enough to use daily, making it ideal for maintaining optimal freshness. The calming, soothing, and healing herbal and botanical ingredients will help keep the pH of your most sensitive area balanced and healthy, so you can face the day with confidence!

Made with plant derived and herbal ingredients including lavender to soothe and calm, organic apple cider vinegar to maintain a healthy pH, and lactic acid that has gentle moisturizing properties to support a balanced pH range of 3.5 to 4.5.

Mommy to Be Wash is made using our gynecologist approved, plant-based formula that is free of chemicals, parabens, carcinogens, and sulfates. Rose water gently aids in protecting and regenerating the skin, Apple cider vinegar reduces overgrowth of bad bacteria, colloidal silver which fights bad bacteria, coconut oil fights odor, and grapefruit seed extract balances pH. This ultra gentle wash ensures even the most sensitive skin will be fresh, clean, and comfortable all day.

Ease your mind and body of feminine care anxieties and discomforts. Mommy to Be Wash is infused with a healing blend of plant based ingredients. These ingredients boost moisture levels, calm irritation, and balance your pH while gently cleansing your most delicate parts during pregnancy or postpartum. They promote optimal feminine health and wellness without any itching or burning. Use alongside our Feminine Wipes for ultimate balancing protection no matter where you go!

A message from our founder Bea Dixon: I was suffering with BV when an ancestor came to me in a dream and gifted me with a vision to heal myself. With her help I created The Honey Pot Company's feminine care powered by herbs that is backed by science, clinically tested and gynecologist approved. Made by humans with vaginas, for humans with vaginas. Because it takes one to know one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great great great
reviews.reviewText: Love the Honey Pot products. Got this because they were sold out of the Honey Pot normal wash I usually get. Still loved it. Refreshing feeling.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buy this even if you’re not pregnant
reviews.reviewText: Tried many products that say they do what this does on the first try. Definitely my go to during this pregnancy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on June 23, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Needed Help, This Did the Trick!
reviews.reviewText: So I'm a pregnant mom with #3 who struggles a little in this department when carrying my precious children in utero. One of the fun symptoms of hormone changes right? Because mood swings, back pain, and acid reflux weren't enough already 🤣 This stuff really really works. It's light and foamy, fragranced a little but not overpowering, and not too soapy or slimy to wipe up. I've noticed a 180 and dont even have to use it more than once or twice a week on top of normal washing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 4, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on March 22, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best cooter soap I've ever tried. Never turning back.
reviews.reviewText: I can't say enough positive things about this product. I recommend it to every one haha. Due to some medical issues I'm quite prone to UTIs, vaginal infections, and my PH is easily thrown off. I can wear the wrong type of underwear on the wrong day and all hell breaks loose. So, if you have similar issues or just want a quality wash; this is it. This soap has helped so much. Quality, gentle ingredients that really help keep things balanced and clean. Hands down the best vajayjay wash I've ever used. I'm a lifer with this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This review is solely based on my experience with this particular wash. For me it burned and made me feel like I was about to get a yeast infection. I am pregnant so I can’t really blame this stuff, however when I use the sensitive honey pot I have no issue. I ordered more of the sensitive. I love all the honeypot products except this one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Foam Pump became jammed + oil inside went rancid
reviews.reviewText: At first when I got this product, I was thrilled!Though, I quickly realized there is FRAGRANCE in the product - don't be fooled by the greenwashing. I did use it because I needed a POST BIRTH gentle cleanser for my lady parts.After a few weeks of use, the foaming pump became very tough to push down - which wasn't originally the case. Not only did the pump become increasingly difficult to "pump", the scent of the product completely changed - I have now determined that the oil inside it has gone rancid.Really unfortunate experience. i do love HoneyPot pads... but you can get other brands like Natracare that are organic and not scented with oils that could go rancid - not worth the risk. I recommend adding your own oils, and I did that to make my own padscicles for post labor healing - IT WAS MAGNIFICENT.
It’s ok but not worth the long wait and the small amount for that price

Too expensive for this tiny bottle. I will not purchase ever again. I bought bigger bottle at target for half this price in January in Florida and it was very good. But this is extremely a small bottle for so much money.
